template.name: Template App Microsoft SQL Server
template.description: Template for MS SQL Server end-point It used for monitoring from Management host with installed Zabbix agent Instance name has to be updated in MACROS section

item.name: Last successful databases' backup (json)
item.description: Master item providing last backups for all databases

item.name: Connections in all databases (json)
item.description: Master item providing current amount of connections for all databases

item.name: Last successful databases' transaction log backup (json)
item.description: Master item providing last transaction log backups for all databases

item.name: State of all databases (json)
item.description: Master item providing current state for all databases

item.name: Databases' waits (json)
item.description: Master item providing current amount of waits for all databases

item_prototype.name: Hours since the last successful database backup of {#DATABASE}
item_prototype.description: Hours since last successful database backup

item_prototype.name: Hours since the last successful transaction log backup of {#DATABASE}
item_prototype.description: Hours since last successful transaction log backup

trigger_prototype.name: Database {#DATABASE} is in an invalid state {ITEM.VALUE}
No database backups for more than {$HOURS_SINCE_LAST_DB_BACKUP} hours for {#DATABASE}
No logs backups for more {$HOURS_SINCE_LAST_LOG_BACKUP} than hours for {#DATABASE}

trigger.name: Agent is not running
trigger.description: Agent for instance is not running
